author: More Perfect Union
description: Starbucks workers rallied in Chicago on Thursday after CEO Brian Niccol, who made $95 million last year, announced that the company will shut down 59 unionized stores and lay off an additional 900 employees. The workers had already planned the rally as a practice picket, part of the union’s effort to pressure Starbucks to keep its word and return to contract negotiations.
title: Starbucks Is Shutting Down 10% of Union Stores, While the CEO Rakes in Millions
